website_summaries.verdict: A fashionable, well-made handbag that's versatile and offers ample space without being bulky or too heavy. A great everyday bag that's made to last and look stylish.
pros: Classic tote design with roomy main compartment
Has several interior and exterior slip pockets
Pebbled leather is attractive and comes in several neutral colors
cons: If you like to carry a bag by hand, you may find the straps too long
However, this isn't a deal-breaker for most buyers

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's the perfect size for me! Read the dimensions before ordering-some people complain of the size- it's your own fault if you don't read the description! Along with the key fob attachment, the inner bag has several compartments- one with a zipper and two on the other side of the bag with a snap fob type closure. The bag was well protected while shipping and arrived along with a dust cover and registration material.I ordered the olive color for fall. Can't wait to get another color when spring/summer arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh L.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I bought this D&B bag for my daughter & she loves it! It is well structured, the olive cokor is rich & the leather is superb. I highly recommend this bag for any woman or girl of any age. You can never go wrong with a Dooney
customer_reviews.author: Ody

customer_reviews.title: Love color. I'm questioning authenticity since I've only had ...
customer_reviews.text: Love color. I'm questioning authenticity since I've only had a month and one side is collapsed and the purse falls over when I place it down. I had one purchased at Macy's and had it for two years and this did not happen
customer_reviews.author: B. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather, structured purse
customer_reviews.text: Great Leather, structured purse. Love it. Handles perfect length for shoulder. Love the pockets on front and back. Perfect access to cell phone, fits perfect and then the pockets inside keeps my key pod. Love the key strap that is attached.First DB purchase and love the leather.
customer_reviews.author: barbi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves her dooney bourke she has three of these
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made bag good size but color not the same. Love it anyway
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: loved the purse and want another
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same purse from QVC in the color elephant, loved the purse and want another. Bought this one in olive and it seems to be of the same quality and everything looks identical to the one I have. Very fast service! Ordered on Sunday and received on Saturday. Would order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful handbag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this handbag with matching wallet. Both are beautiful! Excellent quality! I love the pebble grain leather. I ordered the color olive which is a beautiful neutral color. Goes with anything. It's the perfect size too. I'm short so carrying a large bag looks silly on me, but I still need a decent size bag. This is a great size! Wallet is beautiful & fits all my cards etc. very happy with the price because even after searching around Amazon was still the best price! My first DB bag & the style, color & quality exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Luis n Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Dooney & Bourke. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A Still

customer_reviews.title: D&B
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this bag! Will purchase again from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: TVY

customer_reviews.title: I love this color
customer_reviews.text: I love this color, but have not used it yet , as it is more of a fall and winter bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shari
